name: Dragon Blast
description:
(THIS IS AN IDLE GAME => THIS GAME YOU PLAY BY BEING AFK)
(STAY AWAY FROM THIS GAME IF YOU DONT LIKE IDLERS)
(THERE IS NO ACTION IN THIS GAME , EVERYTHING IS AUTOMATED)



Hello community!

I promissed you guys I would be coming with a FTP game as an apology for the disaster that was KnC...
So!! Here I am again! Well I made a new game on GMS(Gamemaker Studio)
I need to master this game engine! Hopefully I can do you justice this time around.

(DLC isnt necessary...)
Buy it if you want to support me!



1.1 This is an IDLE game...

This is a game where the game plays by itself.. you take almost no action.
Yes I know!! There are several fans of this new game genre all across the web...
I am making these games for them. If you like games with action such
as platformers. You may not like this game.
This is a game for people to try to figure out the best builds to max theyr stats the quickest way possible..
The beauty of IDLE games is that you dont need to click the same buttons
or take the same actions over and over again.. everything is done automatically...

1.2 This is an IDLE game inspired by all those RPGS we play... In this game you will be maxing several stats
and crafting equipment and improving them to move further in the Battle Zones.



  • 180 Equips !
  • Equips are randomly generated...
  • You can merge all your equips with the FORGE ALL button.
  • You can enchant and socket your equipment.
  • Animated Battles(They are actually just 2 chars walking)
  • A Town scene.
  • Talent points to master your abilities
